system.description:
You have become the one thing no elf thought was possible: A better elf.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Elven Elite, you must earn the Fellowship of the Elves.

The Elven Elite starts with Perfect Grace.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.elven-elite.Item.ac7nUNVt5p6BeuOy]{PERFECT GRACE}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.elven-elite.Item.3s5atM7CqSxmCfap]{EVIL'S BANE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.elven-elite.Item.Z2ZrxmissIrUzzyq]{HAND OF SILVER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.elven-elite.Item.weHeuU9ydwyHdxRA]{HYPNOTIC COMMAND}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.elven-elite.Item.27Y4RxjyZTXedYFM]{MASTER OF THE OLD WAYS}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.elven-elite.Item.XCh4b1fcXJgcSUHQ]{SERENITY}

advancements.name: Take the Elven Core Moves (Elder Arts and Touch The World Lightly). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
